subject: Delivery status
description_text:
Dear Simsonn Support Team,

I am writing to inquire about the status of my shipment, tracking number
SF6047197541318.

I have not seen any recent updates regarding its location or estimated
delivery time, and I would appreciate it if you could provide me with the
current status and any relevant information.

Thank you for your time and assistance.

Best regards,
Enrico

Enrico Truglio

Mobile. 340-6145682
e-mail. enrico1090@gmail.com

conversations.body_text: Hi Enrico Truglio,  Please provide your order number, and I will help you check it.

Il numero ordine è
SSN5194

Enrico Truglio

Mobile. 340-6145682
e-mail. enrico1090@gmail.com

Il Mer 7 Gen 2026, 16:58 support@simsonn.com

Hi Enrico Truglio,    Sorry for the delayed response—we just returned from vacation. Here's your shipping tracking link. The haptics have been out of stock for nearly two weeks due to overwhelming demand, but we'll ship yours within the next couple of days. We've included the U-shaped bracket for you, so no need to worry.
